DOC.brief_summary: This study want investigate ultrasound assist epidural catheter insertion labor analgesia easy safe standard epidural technique .
DOC.brief_title: Reliability Ultrasound Assisted Epidural Analgesia Obese Normal Weight Parturients
DOC.detailed_description: This study four specific aim : 1. evaluate congruity palpatory technique ultrasound lumbar evaluation identify correct spinal space ; 2. compare ultrasound evaluation needle measure skin-epidural space depth ; 3. compare longitudinal transverse ultrasound epidural space depth obese normal parturients ; 4. check reduction complication failure rate epidural analgesia ultrasound assistance .
DOC.criteria: woman request epidural analgesia labor woman present contraindication epidural analgesia
